nodes.bodyText: We aren't releasing MSAL with common 2.0.6. This is a hotfix release. I will be cutting a new MSAL release with a new common (most likely 2.0.7) this week.
Yes, but this is being merged into dev no?
Yes, this is being merged into dev
dist API version of MSAL in dev is 1.4.1 which depends on 2.0.2-hf1 , 2.0.6 was for broker
